data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 239,400 people living in Indre, Centre-Val de Loire, France. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Indre, Centre-Val de Loire, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 146,398 people in the county of Indre who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Indre, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Indre, Centre-Val de Loire, France.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Argenton-sur-Creuse
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Argenton-sur-Creuse, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Indre, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Indre, Centre-Val de Loire, France need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Indre, Centre-Val de Loire, France be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

location.name: Indre
location.cities_list: Châteauroux, Issoudun, Déols, Le Blanc, Argenton-sur-Creuse
